title: We’re Getting Old, but We’re Not Doing Anything About It
description: Like climate change, the aging of America demands a serious rethinking of the way we live.
content: For people older than 85, the risk of developing Alzheimers is 14 times higher than for those ages 65 to 69. Contrary to the narrative that America is a selfish society in which most people neglect their older relatives or neighbors, the Alzheimers Associatio… [+3588 chars]
